# IBulkSms.IsValid method

Gets whether the SMS is in acccordance with the smsServiceConfig

```csharp
public bool IsValid(ISmsServiceConfig smsServiceConfig)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| smsServiceConfig | The configuration to be used within the SMS Service |

## Return Value

Whether the SMS is valid
